div.p: >> Bill: HI, I’M BILL O’REILLY.
THANKS FOR WATCHING US TONIGHT.
ON THE FACTOR 17TH BIRTHDAY, LATER, WE HAVE A
LOOK BACK AT SOME UNFORGETTABLE MOMENTS ON
THIS PROGRAM. YOU MIGHT WANT TO CRACK UP
THAT TEBOW DEAL OR WHATEVER ELSE YOU HAVE.
ALSO, SORRY ABOUT THE FROG IN MY THROAT, HE TAKES UP
RESIDENCE TWICE A YEAR LIKE CLOCKWORK.
WILL AMERICANS RISE UP AGAINST OBAMA CARE?
THAT IS THE SUBJECT OF THIS EVENING’S TALKING POINTS
MEMO. IT’S NOW BECOMING APPARENT
THAT MILLIONS OF AMERICANS WILL PAY A LOT MORE FOR
HEALTH INSURANCE UNDER OBAMA CARE.
I WAS TALKING TO SOME INSURANCE PEOPLE THIS
WEEKEND, BIG GUYS, AND THEY ARE HAPPY, THEY LIKE OBAMA
CARE. YOU KNOW WHY?
BECAUSE DEDUCTIBLES AND CO-PAYS ARE GOING UP BIG
TIME. THAT, OF COURSE, MEANS MORE
PROFIT FOR THE HEALTH INSURANCE COMPANIES.
LESS MONEY FOR YOU. NOW, HOW MANY VOTERS DO YOU
THINK KNEW THAT WHILE OBAMA CARE WAS BEING DEBATED?
IN MY OPINION VERY FEW. THAT’S JUST ONE REASON WHY
INDIVIDUAL AMERICANS SHOULD GET A YEAR REPRIEVE FROM
OBAMA CARE. SOME BUSINESSES HAVE THE
REPRIEVE AND YOU SHOULD GET IT, TOO.
THAT’S THE CRUX OF THE GOVERNMENT SHUTDOWN
SITUATION. REPUBLICANS WANT SOME
CHANGES IN OBAMA CARE. THE PRESIDENT AND THE
DEMOCRATS DO NOT. BUT TALKING POINTS IS
ANOTHER QUESTION. WHAT IS BEST FOR THE FOLKS,
THE AMERICAN PEOPLE? THERE IS A TREMENDOUS
AMOUNT OF CONFUSION REGARDING THE FEDERAL
TAKEOVER OF HEALTHCARE. OBAMA CARE IS NOT READY FOR
PRIME TIME. AND EVERYBODY KNOWS IT.
>> HOW MANY HAVE SIGNED UP, SIR?
>> THEY HAVE SIX MONTHS TO SIGN UP.
THIS IS A BIG DECISION. >> HOW MANY SIGNED UP.
>> I DON’T HAVE THE EXACT NUMBER.
>> DO YOU HAVE ANY NUMBER BECAUSE THE GOVERNMENT HAS
REFUSED TO TELL US HOW MANY.
>> IT’S A WRONG QUESTION. >> NO, IT ISN’T.
>> Bill: IT’S THE WRONG QUESTION?
HOW ARROGANT? THERE ARE NO WRONG
QUESTIONS, JUST EVASIVE ANSWERS.
TREASURY SECRETARY JACK LEW IS DONING BECAUSE HE KNOWS,
IT’S VERY HARD TO SIGN UP ON THE GOVERNMENT EXCHANGES
EVEN IF YOU WANT TO. AS YOU MAY KNOW, TALKING
POINTS IS A REASONABLE GUY. I WELL UNDERSTAND THAT
PRESIDENT OBAMA DOES NOT WANT TO CHANGE OR DELAY HIS
SIGNATURE ISSUE. AND SINCE THE PRESIDENT DID
WIN RE-ELECTION AND OBAMA CARE IS A LEGAL LAW, HE HAS
AUTHORITY ON HIS SIDE. THAT’S TRUE.
BUT IF THE PRESIDENT IS REALLY LOOKING OUT FOR THE
FOLKS, HE HAS TO KNOW THINGS ARE NOT WORKING OUT
VERY WELL. AND THAT THE COUNTRY NEEDS
ANOTHER YEAR TO BETTER ORGANIZE THE HEALTH PROGRAM
AND TO SEE WHO IS GOING TO SUFFER BECAUSE OF IT.
THAT’S JUST FAIR. IF REPUBLICANS ARE SMART,
THEY WILL SIMPLY POUND HOME THAT THEME.
DELAY OBAMA CARE FOR A YEAR, SO WE CAN SEE THE
FULL PICTURE. AND ALLOW THE FEDS TO GET
BETTER ORGANIZED. AGAIN, IF OBAMA CARE IS A
GOOD THING, THE FOLKS WILL KNOW IT.
IF IT’S A BAD THING, THEN THE LAW SHOULD BE CHANGED.
RIGHT? ONE YEAR FROM TODAY, THAT
TALE WILL BE TOLD. AND THAT’S THE MEMO.
NOW FOR THE TOP STORY TONIGHT, EVEN SOME LIBERAL
JOURNALISTS ARE GETTING ANNOYED WITH THE WAY THE
OBAMA ADMINISTRATION IS CONDUCTING ITSELF.
APPARENTLY A "NEW YORK TIMES" REPORTER DAVID
ZANGER AND THE FORMER EDITOR OF THE "THE
WASHINGTON POST," LEONARD DOWNIE, SAYING SOME NASTY
THINGS ABOUT THE POWERS THAT BE.
JOINING US NOW FROM NORTH CAROLINA, THE PURVEYOR OF
BERNARD GOLDBERG.COM MR. GOLDBERG.
WHAT’S THE BEEF FROM THE LEFTIES, BERNIE.
>> THERE IS A REPORT COMING OUT THIS WEEK, BILL.
ABOUT PRESS FREEDOM DURING THE OBAMA YEARS.
AND IN IT DAVID ZANGER, HOW MENTIONED WHO IS A VERY
GOOD NATIONAL SECURITY REPORTER FOR THE "NEW YORK
TIMES," HE SAYS AND THIS IS A QUOTE: THAT THE OBAMA
ADMINISTRATION IS THE MOST CLOSED, CONTROLLED FREAK
ADMINISTRATION HE HAS EVER SEEN AND LEONARD DOWNIE WHO
RAN THE NEWSROOM AT "THE WASHINGTON POST" AS YOU
MENTIONED, HE SAYS THAT NATIONAL SECURITY REPORTERS
FIND, THIS IS IS A QUOTE, THAT GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS
ARE INCREASINGLY FEARFUL OF TALKING TO THEM AND THEY
WORRY THAT THEIR FOX COMMUNICATIONS WITH SOURCES
CAN BE MONITORED AT ANY TIME.
SO WHAT THEY’RE BASICALLY SAYING IS THAT THE OBAMA
ADMINISTRATION IS THE MOST SECRETIVE IN MEMORY AND
THEY ARE EVEN PROSECUTING LEAKERS IN GREATER NUMBERS
THAN EVER. AND THIS MAKES IT IT VERY
DIFFICULT FOR REPORTERS TO DO THEIR JOB.
THAT’S BASICALLY WHAT THEY ARE SAYING.
>> Bill: DO YOU BELIEVE THAT?
>> I THINK IT’S A MATTER OF MUCH MORE A MATTER OF GRAY
THAN BLACK AND WHITE. FIRST OF ALL, THEY ARE
TALKING ABOUT NATIONAL SECURITY STORIES.
NOW, I’M WILLING TO ACCEPT THAT IF THE ADMINISTRATION
IS MERELY HIDING STUFF BECAUSE IT WOULD EMBARRASS
THEM, THEN PUBLISH AWAY. BROADCAST EVERYTHING YOU
CAN FIND, PUBLISH EVERYTHING YOU CAN FIND.
BUT, WHAT HAPPENS, BILL, WHEN A LEAKER WHO, BY THE
WAY, HAS TAKEN AN OATH NOT TO DIVULGE SECRET
INFORMATION, WHAT HAPPENS WHEN A LEAKER GOES TO A
REPORTER WITH INFORMATION THAT REALLY IS HARMFUL TO
OUR NATIONAL SECURITY? WE CAN’T SIMPLY TALK ABOUT
THE LEAKER. WE HAVE TO HAVE A
DISCUSSION ABOUT THE REPORTER WHO IS
DISSEMINATING THIS INFORMATION TO MILLIONS AND
MILLIONS OF PEOPLE. YOU CAN’T JUST BLAME THE
LEAKER FOR WHAT HE DID IF HE IS WRONG AND CAUSING
HARM ISN’T THE REPORTER ALSO CAUSING HARM?
I THINK MOST REPORTERS ARE RESPONSIBLE ENOUGH THAT IF
THEY GET INFORMATION THAT IS TRULY HARMFUL.
TRULY HARMFUL THEY WILL BE VERY CAREFUL AND MIGHT NOT
PUBLISH THAT INFORMATION. >> THEY ALL RATIONALIZE.
CREW AND BRADLEY MANNING, THEY ARE ALL LIKE WE ARE
DOING IT FORKED GOOD OF THE COUNTRY PATRIOTS.
>> THAT’S EXACTLY RIGHT. A MILLION WEB SITES AND A
MILLION BLOGGERS. I PREDICT THIS WILL HAPPEN.
SOMEBODY IS GOING TO IT LEAK INFORMATION ABOUT AN
ONGOING INFORMATION AND CIA AGENT AND SOME BAD PLACE IS
GOING TO GET HIS HEAD BLOWN OFF.
>> THAT’S RIGHT. >> AT THAT POINT YOU CAN’T
SIMPLY BLAME THE LEAKER. AT THAT POINT YOU HAVE TO
ALSO HOLD THE SO-CALLED JOURNALIST RESPONSIBLE.
>> Bill: I AGREE. IT’S AN IMPOSSIBLE TO BE
FAIR TO KNOW HOW OPPRESSIVE THE OBAMA ADMINISTRATION
HAS BEEN TOWARD THE REPORTERS.
WE KNOW THE ROSEN SITUATION THAT THEY WERE VERY
INTRUSIVE ON HIM. SO, BUT LET’S, AT THIS
POINT, LET’S JUST RAISE THE QUESTION THAT "ON THE
RECORD," EVEN THE LEFT WINGERS, OKAY, ARE
OBJECTING TO HOW THE OBAMA ADMINISTRATION IS DEALING
WITH INFORMATION FLOW. >> THAT’S RIGHT.
>> NOW, THE GOVERNMENT SHUTDOWN AND -- IS ALL
ABOUT POWER. IT’S ABOUT ONE PARTY TRYING
TO DESTROY THE OTHER. AND POSTURING FOR THE 2014
ELECTIONS. THE FOLKS ARE GETTING HOSED
IN THE PROCESS. DO I HAVE IT CORRECT?
>> WELL, I THINK THE FOLKS HAVE GOTTEN HOSED LONG
BEFORE THE SHUTDOWN. HOW MANY PEOPLE OUT
THERE -- HOW MANY PEOPLE OUT THERE WATCHING US?
HOW MANY MILLIONS OF PEOPLE OUT THERE IN AMERICA EVEN
KNOW WHAT’S IN THE BILL? NOW, I FOLLOW THIS STUFF
AND I DON’T KNOW -- NOT THE BILL, THE LAW.
I FOLLOW THIS STUFF AND I DON’T KNOW.
I’M HEARING ON TELEVISION ONLY IN THE LAST FEW DAYS
THAT IF YOU ARE A WOMAN, LET’S SAY A 5 OR 60 YEARS
OLD, YOUR POLICY HAS TO CONTAIN MATERNITY BENEFITS.
AND IF I HAVE NEVER USED HARD DRUGS IN MY LIFE, MY
POLICY WOULD HAVE TO INCLUDE VISITS TO REHAB.
NOW, IF THAT’S TRUE. WHY DIDN’T WE KNOW ABOUT
THAT TWO YEARS AGO? >> Bill: THAT’S RIGHT.
TERRIBLE JOB. >> Bill: THIS IS WHAT I
DON’T UNDERSTAND FOR PRESIDENT OBAMA.
IF IT’S SO CONFUSING AND SO UP IN THE AIR JUST DELAY IT
A YEAR. EVERYONE WOULD AGREE ON
THAT COMPROMISE. GOVERNMENT WOULD REOPEN.
DEBATE THE DEBT CEILING. --RYTHING WOULD PLAY IN
>> NO SHUTDOWN IF PRESIDENT OBAMA MERELY THREW THE
REPUBLICANS A BONE. YOU CAN’T EXPECT THEM TO IT
COMPROMISE ON REPEAL. YOU CAN’T EXPECT THEM TO
COMPROMISE ON DEFUNDING. BUT HE COULD HAVE GIVEN THE
REPUBLICANS EYE R. DELAY. >> REPEAL OF THE TAX.
HE COULD GIVE THEM REPEAL OF THE MEDICAL DEVICES TAX.
OR BRING CONGRESS INTO IT SO THAT THEY DON’T GET
SPECIAL SUBSIDIES. HE WOULDN’T CONCEDE ON
ANYTHING. YOU MAY BE RIGHT WHEN YOU
SAID THE OTHER DAY THAT THIS STEMS FROM HIS
APPARENT WEAKNESS IN SYRIA. >> NO DOUBT IN MY MIND.
>> CONNECTING THE DOTS TO WHAT’S GOING ON RIGHT NOW.
>> Bill: NEXT ON THE RUNDOWN IS, IT FAIR TO
PUNISH AMERICANS TO HELP OTHER AMERICANS?
YES WE ARE TALKING ABOUT OBAMA CARE.
JUAN AND MARY KATHARINE WILL ANSWER THAT QUESTION.
